text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Astonishment!
Good news of countless victories!!

Dazzling!
The endless shine from a multitude of trophies!
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa

text_block_list.text: Rare and exceptional. I wonder if there has ever been a Trainer as outstanding as this in the past...
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa

text_block_list.text:
Hmmmm... No!
There are none other than you!
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa

text_block_list.text: Expectation! It might just be that my dream, too, will come to fruition. I'm counting on you to continue!!
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
